short_summary: Purchase of Davinci Resolve Color Grading System or Equivalent for Libraries and Archives Canada
description: This solicitation is for the purchase of Davinci Resolve Color Grading System or Equivalent for Libraries and Archives Canada. Bidders can register in the SSC P2P portal to view and access solicitations, submit a response, receive updates and amendments, be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments, and submit invoices and receive payment status updates.
full_summary:
================================

**Davinci Resolve Color Grading System or Equivalent for Libraries and Archives Canada**
=====================================================================================

**Notice Reference**: SSC-23-00025011

**Tender Status**: Exired (Closed)

**Procurement Category**: Government of Canada (General Services)

**Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Region of Opportunity**: Canada (Except National Capital Region)

**Region of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

**Contracting Entity**: Shared Services Canada

**Contact Information**
-------------------

* **Name**: Javier Ventura
* **Phone**: 343 576 9329
* **Fax**: 343 576 9329
* **Email**: None
* **Address**: 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 1B6, Canada

**Tender Description**
--------------------

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking to purchase a Davinci Resolve Color Grading System or Equivalent to support the Libraries and Archives Canada. This solicitation is for the installation and configuration of the said system.

**Submission Details**
--------------------

Bidders can register on the SSC Portal to view and access solicitations, submit a response to a solicitation, receive updates and amendments, and be awarded contracts. To register, please visit the SSC Portal at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login).

**Attachments**
-------------

The tender document can be downloaded from the SSC Portal at the following URL: [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/C567C9F4-18B3-4664-A7ED-F1AD8800C085](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/C567C9F4-18B3-4664-A7ED-F1AD8800C085).

**Tender Schedule**
------------------

* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-25
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-01-03T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
* **Expected Contract End Date**: None

**Please Note**: This solicitation has expired and is no longer accepting submissions. SSC
